#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

#ifdef WIN32
    #define gc getchar
#else
    #define gc getchar_unlocked
#endif

int t, n;

void fr(int* input) {
    char c = 0;

    while((c = gc()) < 33) {}

    *input = 0;

    while(c > 33){
        *input = *input * 10 + c - '0';
        c = gc();
    }
}


int main() {

    //freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    fr(&t);

    while(t--) {
        fr(&n);

        if(!(n % 2) || !(n % 3)) {
            printf("YES\n");
        }
        else {
            printf("NO\n");
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
